confirmed_facts: LS Electric delivered approximately 50 million KRW worth of winter clothing and footwear to about 150 elderly residents in Anyang Cityâ€™s senior welfare center on 2025-11-25.
The event marked the 12th annual winter clothing donation program by LS Electric, which has been operating since 2014.

timeline.event: LS Electric began seasonal social contribution programs for lowâ€‘income and vulnerable groups.
